WWWOFFLE Built-In Web-Server

Any URLs to WWWOFFLE on port 8080 that refer to the directory '/local/' are taken from the files in the 'local' sub-directory of the spool directory or if they do not exist there then it will search 'html/$LANG/local', 'html/default/local' and 'html/en/local'.

This allows trivial web-pages to be provided without a separate web-server. There are no CGIs or directory indexes available. The MIME type used for these files are those that are specified in the configuration file.

Important
The local web-page server will follow symbolic links, but will only allow access to files that are world readable. See the FAQ for security issues.
